meaningMnemonic: Here you <radical>stand</radical>, a <radical>hair</radical>’s breadth away from the edge of a <radical>cliff</radical>, when out of nowhere a <radical>geoduck</radical> slaps you right in the <kanji>face</kanji>. Geoducks are gross, and you back away from the edge of the cliff you were standing but a hair’s breadth away from just before. Your face is all gooey from the geoduck’s slimy residue.
readingMnemonic: But where did that geoduck come from anyway? As you turn around from the cliff edge, wiping the goop from your <kanji>face</kanji> and out of your eyes, you see an angry <reading>cow</reading> (かお). This cow is the one who hit you in the face with this geoduck. I know not the reason, but this cow is most definitely not happy with you.
